This is on fedora 27
I get:

```
$ cat compilers.yaml
compilers:
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: fedora27
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/clang
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/clang++
      f77: null
      fc: null
    spec: clang@4.0.1
    target: x86_64
- compiler:
    environment: {}
    extra_rpaths: []
    flags: {}
    modules: []
    operating_system: fedora27
    paths:
      cc: /usr/lib64/ccache/gcc
      cxx: /usr/lib64/ccache/g++
      f77: null
      fc: null
    spec: gcc@7
    target: x86_64
```
title: 'spack compiler find' does not detect gfortran when using ccache
